aiSever.title: AI enhanced services
aiSever.description:
You can enable AI-enhanced services. Osai will remember your files by a powerful AI model.

üß† Document Understanding: With AI's understanding, you can find this document faster and easier.

üîç AI auto-tags files‚Äîsearch & find, skip categorizing

üñºÔ∏è understand Image: Truly understanding the content of an image, not just relying on OCR.
aiSever.emptyResultTip: You can use AI enhancement services to let AI remember your files.

aiMark.requireTitle: AI Mark requires the following components

step1.ask: üìñ Ask questions: You can ask questions about the document (coming soon).
step1.desc: You can let AI mark this file. AI understands and analyzes the document. With AI's understanding, you can find this file more easily:
step1.entry: Open AI Mark from right-click menu
step1.summaryImage: üñºÔ∏è Image summary: Truly understand image content, not just OCR.
step1.understand: üß† Understand: With AI understanding, you can locate this file faster and more easily.

step2.cuda: CUDA Service (optional: GPU acceleration, available if your PC has GPU)
step2.tips:
üìå Download takes about 5‚Äì10 minutes (depending on your network). You can still use other features during download.
üìå Internet connection required during download

step3.done: Try right-clicking the file and choose AI Mark. AI will now remember your file! (CUDA service takes effect after restart)

contact.title: Expected results but got none? Tell us to improve.

preload.updateContent: A new version is available. Do you want to update?

reportProtocol.content:
To keep improving, we anonymously send crash and performance stats‚Äîno personal data ever.

 These include:

üìå Program exceptions: such as crashes, error codes. etc.
üìå Performance data: such as download speed, operation response time, and featureusage frequency(anonymous).

You can disable this protocol at any time in Settings.
reportProtocol.title: Help lmprove Osai

updateTips.content:
üìå New hotkey: You can now press Alt+Space to summon the hotkey and find files more easily; press ESC or the hotkey again to hide.
üìå New system tray: Closing the app now minimizes it to the system tray in the bottom-right corner. You can find the osai icon there and right-click to exit. While minimized to tray, you can still summon the hotkey anytime.
üìå Expanded search categories: You can now search for folders and applications in the search bar summoned by the hotkey.
updateTips.title: Version Update Introduction

guide.step1: Osai will remember the files you have opened
guide.step2: Search by content even if you forget the title.

guide.step4: All content stays local and 100% private lock.
